message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value, I propose an initial offer of $950000. This price reflects the quality and potential impact of the product. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget allows for a lower price. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I must respectfully decline. Our product's value justifies a higher price due to its unique features and benefits. I would like to counterpropose a price of $900000. This still offers a significant discount while ensuring fair compensation for our efforts and the product's quality.
I appreciate your response, Alice. After considering the value of your product and my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $885000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of this, I would like to counteroffer at $910000. This price reflects the value of our product and acknowledges your budgetary considerations. I hope this aligns better with your financial plans.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and would like to propose a final counteroffer of $895000. I believe this price respects both the value of your product and my budget constraints.

I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial agreement, Bob. Considering your last proposal, I would like to counteroffer at $905000. This price aims to balance the value of the product with your financial capacity, while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I've given it careful consideration and would like to propose a final counteroffer of $898000. I believe this price respects the value of your product while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your persistent efforts, Bob. After reviewing your latest proposal, I am willing to consider $900000 as a final counteroffer. This price respects the value of our product while also acknowledging your budgetary limitations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $897000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement.
